ingredients: 1 ounce / 28 grams packet taco seasoning OR make your own
700 grams / 24 ounces tomato passata or pureed canned tomatoes
14 ounces / 400 grams canned red kidney beans (or any other beans), drained
3-4 soft tortillas (flour or corn), for layering
1 cup grated cheese (I used mozzarella, but any melting cheese is fine)
